name: Sevai Karangal
briefDescription: We select the homes that are running short of funds. Once they get sufficient funds we move to a different home that is in bad shape.1.   We take responsibility of one item which they run short and provide is for a longer time. E.g. providing milk/dal for a year.2.   Divert funds for meal or any donation if a member is willing to give on occasion of birthday/anniversary.3.   Speak with Corporate/ individuals to support that home4.   Publicize the home so that they receive more fundson an average around 300 kids from 14 homes get benefit every year
